title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A classic 35mm rangefinder camera known for its precision mechanics and legendary build quality, beloved by photographers and collectors.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: An iconic rock guitar with a sleek double-cutaway body and powerful humbuckers, played by legends like Angus Young and Tony Iommi.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Apple's revolutionary personal computer that introduced the graphical user interface to the masses. A pivotal moment in tech history.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: A timeless luxury dive watch with unmatched durability, precision, and style. A must-have piece for watch enthusiasts.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare first edition of one of America's greatest novels, capturing the essence of the Jazz Age and the American Dream.
